title: 110: Pilot Pete’s Premiere (Part 2)
itunes:title: 110: Pilot Pete’s Premiere (Part 2)
description:
The Broads are back discussing the SECOND half of Pilot Pete’s first episode! They discuss his first group date, sexy plane lingo, Madison’s iconic one-on-one, Barbara’s debut, honest opinions about Hannah’s 2nd appearance in this episode, and much more! 
Make sure to subscribe to the podcast and rate 5 stars if you are enjoying it! #broadsquad
